import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useSwipeable}from'react-swipeable';import'./ProfilePage.css';import backgroundImage from'./components/background.png';// Подключаем Telegram WebApp API
import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Telegram=window.Telegram?window.Telegram.WebApp:null;const ProfilePage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const userName=localStorage.getItem('userName')||'Гость';const[swipeClass,setSwipeClass]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{if(Telegram){Telegram.expand();console.log("Telegram WebView активирован");}},[]);const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('userToken');localStorage.removeItem('userUuid');navigate('/');};const handleSwipeRight=()=>{console.log("Свайп вправо обнаружен!");setSwipeClass('swipe-right');setTimeout(()=>{navigate('/main-menu');},500);};const swipeHandlers=useSwipeable({onSwipedRight:handleSwipeRight,preventDefault:true,trackTouch:true,trackMouse:false});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`profile-container ${swipeClass}`,style:{backgroundImage:`url(${backgroundImage})`,backgroundSize:'cover',backgroundPosition:'center'},...swipeHandlers,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"profile-text",children:[userName,", \u043D\u0430\u0436\u043C\u0438 \u0447\u0442\u043E\u0431\u044B \u0432\u044B\u0439\u0442\u0438"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-btn",onClick:handleLogout,children:"\u0412\u044B\u0439\u0442\u0438"})]});};export default ProfilePage;
